name: BlankPage
tag_list: e-publishing, digital-publishing, ebooks, magazines, newspapers, b2b-technology, monetization, distribution, secure, protection, drm, mobile, desktop, browser, web
overview: BlankPage is a swiss company that empowers publishers through consulting and technology to securely distribute and monetize their electronic content. It offers solutions for protecting, selling, transferring and viewing books, magazines and newspapers on various devices.
